nodes.bodyText: This is not required but it is intentional in this listing.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1008,6 +1008,7 @@ task publishAllJars() {
     dependsOn ':shared:security'
     dependsOn ':shared:protocol:publish'
     dependsOn ':segmentstore:contracts:publish'
+    dependsOn ':segmentstore:storage:testJar'

nodes.bodyText: Isn't this going to publish ALL test JARs, instead of just the one we want?

Yes Andrei that is intentional and it is not visible unless users click on 'view all' as on this page: https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/pravega/pravega-test-testcommon/0.7.1
but you are right we need this jar right away and it is blocking bindings.
